title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI & server that lets you pull, run, and manage quantized LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—browser & Node.js ready.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-user support and file uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models as inline code copilots.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and Blazor sample for chatting with Ollama models from C#.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for CPU & GPU serving.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with local models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG over PDFs using Ollama embeddings & Llama 3.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js wrapper with TypeScript types and async iterator support.

title: ollama-py
summary: Third-party Python client emphasizing Pydantic models and automatic retries.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings and Tokio-based async client.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support.
